backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the chat backend, defining data types (Message, Chatroom, UserProfile, etc.) and managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, active users, and access control with admin-only operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: URL detection with ExternalLink icons in MessageBubble, and an external link disclaimer modal that intercepts link clicks before opening them in a new tab.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference document for the project's frontend component structure and functionality.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with cache-busting meta tags, a root div, and a versioned module script tag pointing to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally rendering the Header and Footer while hiding both on admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component allowing users to set their avatar via file upload, GIF search (Giphy), or removal, with debounced search and trending GIF fallback.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders messages, handles sending, reply context, auto-scroll, pinned video, category badges, and scroll-to-highlighted-message functionality for deep-linked messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a card for a chatroom with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, displaying topic, stats, and live status badges.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating a new chatroom with fields for topic, description, category, and media (image upload, video URL, or Twitter post).
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: Dialog that warns users before navigating to an external URL, showing the target link and offering Cancel or Continue actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with the Chattr logo, back-to-lobby navigation when inside a chatroom, and an inline username editor with avatar picker.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is intentionally not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble with support for reactions, pinning, replies, inline media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Giphy), and external link warnings.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image uploads, voice recording, GIF search via Giphy, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in typed text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages featuring a waveform visualization, play/pause toggle, seek slider, and playback time display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest settled value after the delay expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty cached chatroom data and forces a fresh refetch of the chatrooms query once the actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity, status) via a React context provider backed by the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks for all backend interactions including fetching, searching, and mutating chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and pinned videos.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a single utility function `formatCompactNumber` that formats numbers into compact human-readable strings (k, M, B suffixes).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs via the Giphy API, returning normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a lazy-loader for the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using an HTML canvas, with configurable max dimensions, quality, and progress callback.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter embed rendering utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author name, text, image URL) with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage cache layer for Twitter oEmbed preview data, supporting versioned entries with a 7-day expiration and cache key derivation from tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail fetching utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching utility.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video/post IDs and generating thumbnail or embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin page that lists all chatrooms in a filterable table and allows deletion of individual chatrooms via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, increments its view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component; handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable, category-filterable, algorithmically sorted list of chatrooms with a button to create new ones.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Chattr tracking existing features (URL detection with ExternalLink icon and external-link disclaimer modal) and a pending feature request combining both behaviors.
